ygData.subject: Re: Need Help
ygData.msgSnippet: Work has banned Yahoo clubs so I now cannot access this page from work now. *pout* But at any rate... 1) Wow... surprised it can be done. =) The
ygData.messageBody:
Work has banned Yahoo clubs so I now cannot
access this page from work now. *pout*<br><br>But at any
rate...<br><br>1) Wow... surprised it can be done. =) The moving
characters between accounts that is. Not too surprised if
they're on the same credit card though.<br><br>2) Ring of
Combines/Dreadlands may be safe in the immediate vicinity BUT I've
been told many many aggresive mobs hang around that
ring so you can't leave the safety of the ring for too
long... took me forever to find those 24 and 29th level
spells as well. I still have some to buy off the
Steamfont Druid vendor as well as Anti-poison/disease
spells.<br><br>shooman out<br>Fatedhue Prismatic<br>Master
Fisher/Beggar/Tracker<br>Excellent Brewer (100 skill ... need one more to master),
Wood Elf Druid
